record.title: RECESS UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
RECESS UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - December 10, 2008)

[Page: S10887]

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand in recess under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 6:45 p.m., recessed until Thursday, December 11, 2008, at 10 a.m.
